NK036(chi)017:0: gcud phur gsum gyi rgyab yig gsang ba'i man ngag
NK036(chi)017:1: bzhugs so m+wa thatra1narbaga da ni rgya mtsho ar la
NK036(chi)017:2: gtad pa'i dum bu 'og ma'i gab pa rnams mngon
NK036(chi)017:3: du 'byin par byed pa'i gnad kyi yi ge gsang
NK036(chi)017:4: ba rgyab rten gsang bar byed pa'i gnad bstan pa
NK036(chi)017:5: ni 'di la ni slob dpon gyis yang dag pa'i
NK036(chi)017:6: gnad gnyis las gsungs te drang ba'i gnad dang thig
NK036(chi)017:7: le stong pa'i sgron ma rang gi ngo bo'i gnad
NK036(chi)017:8: gnyis las ma gsung pas 'dir yang gnad kyi man
NK036(chi)017:9: ngag gsang ba nyis las drang ba'i thabs kyi gnad
NK036(chi)017:10: ni gsum ste lus gnad dngos kyi sgron ma gtems
NK036(chi)017:11: te yang dag pa'i gnad da lta nyid du snang
NK036(chi)017:12: bar bstan pa dang gnad rtsa'i gnad kyis sgron ma
NK036(chi)017:13: nyid yur bar drang ba dang /
NK036(chi)017:14: yul dang dbang po'i gnad kyis sgron ma nam mkha'
NK036(chi)017:15: la dbyung bar bya ba yin no de la skyes
NK036(chi)017:16: bu dad pa dang ldan zhing rang bzhin rdzogs pa
NK036(chi)017:17: chen po'i don la mos pa zhig gis sngon du
NK036(chi)017:18: rang gi bla ma mnyes par byas nas sgron ma
NK036(chi)017:19: ar la gtad pa'i gsang chen gyis man ngag 'di
NK036(chi)017:20: ni yang nas yang du gras thag bcad la 'jig
NK036(chi)017:21: rten 'di'i zhen pa'i blo thams cad dor la rang
NK036(chi)017:22: bzhin gnyis su med pa'i dgongs pa la gnas par
NK036(chi)017:23: bya ba'i phyir rang gi yul rkyen gyis mi gnod
NK036(chi)017:24: pa'i dgon par song la grogs spangs la rang gcig
NK036(chi)017:25: pur gnas par bya'o de nas dum bu gong ma'i
NK036(chi)017:26: gnad kyi yi ger bstan pa ltar lus ngag yid
NK036(chi)017:27: gsum gyi gnad rnams bstun la sgron ma brtan pa'i
NK036(chi)017:28: gnad bya ste gong ltar lus dal bar gnas pa
NK036(chi)017:29: gnad yin pas da ni lus 'dug stangs rin po
NK036(chi)017:30: che gnad kyi man ngag yin te stan bde ba'i
NK036(chi)017:31: steng du lus drang srong lta bu'i 'dug stangs bya
NK036(chi)017:32: bas te gru mo gnyis pus mo'i steng du bzhag
NK036(chi)017:33: la lus kyi cha bsrangs la rang gi lag pa
NK036(chi)017:34: g.yas g.yon mtheb mdzub bzhi yis mig gnyis kyi tha
NK036(chi)017:35: ma gnyis gtsir bas sgron ma'i snang ba 'od kyi
NK036(chi)017:36: thig le rma bya'i mdongs kyi rnam pa lta ba
NK036(chi)017:37: zhig 'char te de la rang gi shes pa gtad
NK036(chi)017:38: cing nyams su blangs pa ni nyin mtshan thun bzhi'am
NK036(chi)017:39: drug tu bcad la bsgom par bya'o de ltar du
NK036(chi)017:40: byas pas sgron ma nyid la snang bar snang ba
NK036(chi)017:41: 'di kun kyang ser lam lam pa'am dmar lam lam
NK036(chi)017:42: pa'am dkar lam lam pa'am sngon lam lam pa'am rtser
NK036(chi)017:43: rtser dang lhang lhang po'i snang ba dag 'byung bas
NK036(chi)017:44: te de nas rang gi mtheb mdzub kyi rtsol ba
NK036(chi)017:45: btang kyang phyi rol gyi sa rdo ri brag gi
NK036(chi)017:46: snang ba 'di nyid mi snang bar gong ma'i snang
NK036(chi)017:47: ba'i rnam par gyur nas yun ring bar snang ba
NK036(chi)017:49: de yang bde dang sdug bsngal rgyu mthun zhes 'gro
NK036(chi)017:50: ba'i mgon po sems dpas gsungs zhes pas sdug bsngal
NK036(chi)017:51: med par bde ba mi 'byung bas bde ba'i sna
NK036(chi)017:52: sdug bsngal gyis 'khrid par byed pa yin de'i phyir
NK036(chi)017:53: na dang po mig mi bde ba la sogs pa
NK036(chi)017:55: de la brten nas bde ba nyid rang lugs su 'char bar byed pa yin no //
NK036(chi)017:56: de nas lus kyi 'dug stangs gal che ste /
NK036(chi)017:57: rgya mdud kyi 'dril lugs ni mig rab tu dril
NK036(chi)017:58: nas lta ba nyid yin no mda' smyug gi srong
NK036(chi)017:59: lugs ni lus kyi cha bsrangs pas rtsa mi 'khyog
NK036(chi)017:60: par drang por gnas rtsa ma 'chus pas ye shes
NK036(chi)017:61: zang thal du shar bas dgongs pa la skye 'bri
NK036(chi)017:62: med par gnas pa'o de'i phyir nas lus kyi dngos
NK036(chi)017:63: po'i gnad 'di gal che zhes te lus la rig
NK036(chi)017:64: pa'i sgron ma brten nas yod pa'i gnad kyis rig
NK036(chi)017:65: pa'i khyim gzhom zhes bya ste sa'i gnad kyis drang
NK036(chi)017:66: ba'i thabs kyis sgron ma nyid yur bar drong ba
NK036(chi)017:67: ni phug gtib pa'i gnad dang lam bsgyur ba'i gnad
NK036(chi)017:68: dang srang dgag pa'i gnad dang 'phrang sgug pa'i gnad
NK036(chi)017:69: rnams kyis bstan pa yin no phug gtibs pa'i gnad
NK036(chi)017:70: ni mig steng 'og gnyis gtims pa'i thabs kyis snang
NK036(chi)017:71: ba ma dag pa rnams dag par byed pa yin
NK036(chi)017:72: lam bsgyur ba ni kha sna'i rlung bsdams te lus
NK036(chi)017:73: drag tu gcud pas 'od dmar po me stag gi
NK036(chi)017:74: rnam pa lta bur spros te 'dis ni shes rab
NK036(chi)017:75: kyi rtsal 'byin par byed pa'o srang dag pa'i gnad
NK036(chi)017:76: ni rlung bteg pa sgor sbas te mgrin pa cung
NK036(chi)017:77: tsam dgug la mthe bong shin tu drag bsgrim snar
NK036(chi)017:78: sug pa'i rlangs sam phye ma btab na snang ba
NK036(chi)017:79: thams cad ye shes kyi skar ma'i rnam pa shar
NK036(chi)017:80: nas sa rdo'i snang ba 'di 'gag par nges par
NK036(chi)017:81: yin no de'i phyir ye shes skar ma lam me
NK036(chi)017:82: ba ces gsungs so 'phrang sgug pa ni mig gi
NK036(chi)017:83: tha ma gnyis mtheb mdzub kyis gtems pas sgron ma
NK036(chi)017:84: dngos su 'char bar byed pa yin no 'di ltar
NK036(chi)017:85: du ni nyin mtshan du bsgoms pas 'di nyid dang
NK036(chi)017:86: ma bral bar nyams su blangs pas snang cha sna
NK036(chi)017:87: tshogs par 'char bar nges so mig ma bde ba
NK036(chi)017:88: dang thun gyi mtshams rnams su gong du gtims pa'i
NK036(chi)017:89: dus kyi sgron ma la yid gtad cing nyams su
NK036(chi)017:90: blangs pas don 'grub pa yin no yul dang dbang
NK036(chi)017:91: po'i gnad kyis drang pa'i thabs ni gong ltar lus
NK036(chi)017:92: kyi 'dug stangs kyis gnad drangs la nam mkha' sprin
NK036(chi)017:93: dang bral ba'i dus su kha lho phyogs su bltas
NK036(chi)017:94: la gtad sa'i 'ben ci yang rung ba cig la
NK036(chi)017:95: gtad la mig gi mtha' gnyis gtems la dbus kyi
NK036(chi)017:96: 'ben la lta sgron ma nyid la mi gtad par
NK036(chi)017:97: snang ba nyid la lta'o de nas snang ba shar
NK036(chi)017:98: ba'am ser ba la sogs par gyur nas sa rdo
NK036(chi)017:99: mi snang ba dag 'ong de nas mig gtems pa
NK036(chi)017:100: dang bral kyang 'ong ste de la gtad cing lta
NK036(chi)017:101: yang lta tsa na gtems de nyid la bltas pas
NK036(chi)017:102: rab 'bring tha ma'i bye brag gis nyi ma bcu
NK036(chi)017:103: gcig dang nyer gcig dang sum cu rtsa lnga bar
NK036(chi)017:104: ma chad par byas nas sa rdo la sogs dngos
NK036(chi)017:105: po'i snang ba 'gags te srid pa'i bar do'i snang
NK036(chi)017:106: ba lta bu la spyod par nges pa yin no
NK036(chi)017:107: drang thabs gsum gyi gnad bstan pa'o sgron ma'i thig
NK036(chi)017:108: le stong pa'i gnad ni de ltar snang ba 'gags
NK036(chi)017:109: pa'i dus kyi tshe sgron ma nyid la gtad cing
NK036(chi)017:110: nyams su blangs pas lo lnga dang bdun dang bcu
NK036(chi)017:111: gcig na ye shes lnga'i snang ba rnam par dag
NK036(chi)017:112: pa 'byung bar nges te rang bzhin rnam par dag
NK036(chi)017:113: pa'i chos nyid kyi bar do lta bu'i snang ba
NK036(chi)017:114: la longs spyod par nges so gnad kyi man ngag
NK036(chi)017:115: de lta bu dang bstun pas rnal 'byor pa'i don
NK036(chi)017:116: 'grub pa yin no rgya mtsho ar la gtad pa'i
NK036(chi)017:117: rgyab brten gyi yi ge dam pa gsang ba'i gab
NK036(chi)017:118: yig nag po gnad rnams bsdus pa'i sgron ma mkhas
NK036(chi)017:119: pa bye ma la mu dras mdzad pa rdzogs so
NK036(chi)017:120: +thii rgya rgya rgya 'di med gzhan la spyod pa'i
NK036(chi)017:121: sgom chen yi re chad de yi phyir na gsang
NK036(chi)017:122: ba'i rgyab yig gces las can de dang 'phrad par
NK036(chi)017:123: shog sa ma y+aa sngags kyi srung mas srungs shig
